hero.question: Will Bitcoin dip to $45,000 by December 31, 2026?
hero.prob_take: The 10-point drop signals capitulation among Bitcoin bulls who got spooked by macro headwinds, but smart money is quietly accumulating at these odds since a 45K bottom is only a 28% move from here in 2 years. At 50.5%, the market is fairly pricing in mean reversion, but the real tell will be whether we see institutional buying at $50K support or if the next Fed signal triggers another flush down.

daily_take.headline: Bitcoin's $45K Floor Just Got 10 Points Cheaper. Smart Money's Buying.
daily_take.deck: Bitcoin dip odds collapsed 10 points overnight to 50.5%, signaling market confidence in a floor above $45K by year-end 2026. But a 50-50 coin flip on a 2-year horizon screams underpriced volatility. Volume is thin at $1.5M. Sharp bettors are loading the "yes" side here, betting on macro chaos, Fed policy mistakes, or a 2025 crash that never fully recovers.
